Bead - Class in com.olliebown.beads.core
Bead is an abstract class which defines basic behaviour such as starting and stopping, deleting and handling messages.

Buffer - Class in com.olliebown.beads.data
A StaticBuffer stores a one-dimensional buffer of floats statically so that it can be accessed by multiple classes without need for a reference to an object.
